instanceVariables.name: level
instanceVariables.desc: The current level of the player.

instanceVariables.name: experience
instanceVariables.desc: How much experience the player currently has.

instanceVariables.name: coins
instanceVariables.desc: How many coins the player possesses.

instanceVariables.name: actionSpeed
instanceVariables.desc: How fast the player performs actions, in arbitrary units.

instanceVariables.name: movementSpeed
instanceVariables.desc: How fast the player moves.

instanceVariables.name: pickupRange
instanceVariables.desc: How far away the player can pickup items, in pixels.

instanceVariables.name: attackRange
instanceVariables.desc: The range of the player's basic attack.

instanceVariables.name: currentHealth
instanceVariables.desc: How much health the player currently has.

instanceVariables.name: maxHealth
instanceVariables.desc: The maximum amount of health the player can have.

instanceVariables.name: healthRegen
instanceVariables.desc: How much health the player regenerates, per second.

instanceVariables.name: currentMana
instanceVariables.desc: How much mana the player currently has.

instanceVariables.name: maxMana
instanceVariables.desc: The maximum amount of mana the player can have.

instanceVariables.name: manaRegen
instanceVariables.desc: How much mana the player regenerates, per second.

instanceVariables.name: armor
instanceVariables.desc: Used when calculating how likely the player is to block an attack.

instanceVariables.name: slashDamage
instanceVariables.desc: The amount of slash damage that the player does.

instanceVariables.name: smashDamage
instanceVariables.desc: The amount of smash damage that the player does.

instanceVariables.name: stabDamage
instanceVariables.desc: The amount of stab damage that the player does.

instanceVariables.name: coldDamage
instanceVariables.desc: The amount of cold damage that the player does.

instanceVariables.name: fireDamage
instanceVariables.desc: The amount of fire damage that the player does.

instanceVariables.name: lightningDamage
instanceVariables.desc: The amount of lightning damage that the player does.

instanceVariables.name: arcaneDamage
instanceVariables.desc: The amount of arcane damage that the player does.

instanceVariables.name: holyDamage
instanceVariables.desc: The amount of holy damage that the player does.

instanceVariables.name: physicalResistance
instanceVariables.desc: Used when calculating how much physical damage the player receives.

instanceVariables.name: coldResistance
instanceVariables.desc: Used when calculating how much cold damage the player receives.

instanceVariables.name: fireResistance
instanceVariables.desc: Used when calculating how much fire damage the player receives.

instanceVariables.name: lightningResistance
instanceVariables.desc: Used when calculating how much lightning damage the player receives.

instanceVariables.name: arcaneResistance
instanceVariables.desc: Used when calculating how much arcane damage the player receives.

instanceVariables.name: corruptResistance
instanceVariables.desc: Used when calculating how much corrupt damage the player receives.

instanceVariables.name: degrees
instanceVariables.desc: The angle which the player is currently facing.

instanceVariables.name: lastX
instanceVariables.desc: The position on the X axis the player was at during the last tick.

instanceVariables.name: lastY
instanceVariables.desc: The position on the Y axis the player was at during the last tick.

instanceVariables.name: flinchResistance
instanceVariables.desc: Used when calculating if the player will flinch when taking damage.

instanceVariables.name: relocateToX
instanceVariables.desc: The coordinate on the X axis where the player should be on the new layout.

instanceVariables.name: relocateToY
instanceVariables.desc: The coordinate on the Y axis where the player should be on the new layout.

instanceVariables.name: busyCastingAbility
instanceVariables.desc: Whether or not the player is busy casting an ability.

instanceVariables.name: talkingToNpc
instanceVariables.desc: The NPC to which the player is currently talking.

instanceVariables.name: isFemale
instanceVariables.desc: Used to determine if the player needs default chest gear.
